portfolio.title: Unthether
portfolio.description: Website allowing users to round up their purchases to the nearest dollar, using the difference to make micropayments on specified loans.

portfolio.title: Groupify
portfolio.description: An IOS app that allows teachers to manipulate class and student data to accelerate the pace of attendance, classroom activities.

portfolio.title: Stock Market Predictor
portfolio.description: A web app that uses machine learning to predict the stock market.

portfolio.title: Bit Array Scheduler
portfolio.description: A scheduler that uses a bit array to schedule processes.
